Class CurlerPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • CurlerPlayer

  • public class CurlerPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Assignment 5, Fall 2014: CurlerPlayer Class (Worker Class) Implement and compute the curler player's first name, last name, and position Computations executed using getter and setter methods as well as data from the enumerated class called Curler Position.
    Author:
    Ebony Cross
